data.title: Dino De Laurentiis Biography & Filmography
data.meta_description: Agostino “Dino” De Laurentiis was an Italian-American film producer who died on November 10, 2010.

Dino De Laurentiis

Agostino “Dino” De Laurentiis was an Italian-American film producer who died on November 10, 2010. He was one of the producers who, along with Carlo Ponti, pushed Italian film on the international stage towards the end of WWII. He produced or co-produced almost 500 films, 38 of which received Academy Award nominations. In the late 1930s and early 1940s, he also had a brief acting career. De Laurentiis died on November 10, 2010, at the age of 91, in his Beverly Hills home.
